title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: But ah've goat a wee bitty business masel this affie, so ah'm turnindoon the Newhaven Road, Bowtow-bound.Whin ah gits tae the lock-upMatty's awready thaire. Ah've goat tae say right fae the off that Matty'sone ay the few boys ah jist cannae git oan wi.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Alison thought of the lastfuneral she was at. It would have been Gary McVie from school, who'ddied on Newhaven Road, driving home a stolen car while drunk. He wasa young, popular and good-looking boy, and there had been a big turnout.
